  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GenericCardGameCard.Display  
    GenericCardGameCard.Suit  
    GenericCardGameCard.Value
    each enum has been given a value in brackets behind it this will allow us to compare their values later note: in some games the ACE will be low and this may have to be changed
    WarCardGamePlayer.Destination
    HAND is where the ArrayList of cards that are currently in the players hand go WINPILE is where the ArrayList of cards the player has won go when the player runs out of cards in their hand the WINPILE is taken and put into the HAND
